value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Damn it! They're hot on our heels.
Can we break through? Maybe
there's a way—$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Surrender, Askrans.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|By whose order?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|I am Laegjarn, a general of Múspell.
By authority of my father, King Surtr,
I have charge of this region of Nifl.$k$pThough we may be enemies, I
commend your bravery, warriors of
Askr. You have led quite the chase...$k$pBut for now, you may rest. Ultimately,
you cannot triumph. You may claw
out small victories...$k$pBut our forces are too large. You
must surrender. Submit quietly and
you will not be harmed. I swear it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|The contrast with Surtr could not be
more profound...$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|Yes. She has integrity. Ever since our
defeat, she has treated the citizens of
Nifl with respect.$k$pIt's difficult to believe she's Surtr's
daughter, isn't it?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|I, for one, am glad this apple fell far
from the tree!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|General of Múspell! I thank you for
your offer, fairly made. We have,
however, no choice but to decline.$k$pWe came here with one goal—to
save Askr. Whatever the odds,
we will pursue it.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|I see. You leave us with no choice
but to carry out our father's orders.$k$p$EFace_Cool|You face two of Múspell's generals
in battle. Prepare for defeat at the
hands of Laegjarn and Laevatein!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Your strength... I was not prepared for
this!$k$pI underestimated you, Askrans. Your
tactics outclass mine. You are both
powerful and skilled in battle...$k$pIt wasn't a waste, though. I learned
some very interesting things.$k$pFor now... I'll take my leave of you.$k$p

$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Laegjarn... Are you hurt?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Don't worry, Laevatein. I'm fine.$k$p$EFace_Anger|They're very strong. If we don't
think of some better tactics, we'll
never defeat them.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|I will set myself ablaze.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|You will not! The hellfire of Múspell is
dangerous. Your soul itself would be
in peril!$k$pThe flame would burn your life
away...$k$pListen to me, Laevatein. You must
not do this. Promise me that you
won't.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|If that's what you want... I promise.$k$pBut, Laegjarn... We lost. What do we
do now?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Don't worry.$k$pWe can figure it out together, just like
we always have. Let's start with this:
why is the enemy here?$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|I don't know...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Their kingdom is on the brink of
destruction. Their people are
suffering.$k$pYet here they are. They must have
a very good reason to be here.$k$pAre they fleeing Father? I don't think
so. Look at their eyes. Their hope has
not been extinguished...$k$pThey must have traveled here
seeking a means to defeat Múspell.$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|If that's what you think... That must
be it.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Smile|There you go again. Thank you, little
sister. But now, let's think. What could
turn the tide of battle in their favor?$k$pAn ally? A weapon? Do they mean to
lure us to advantageous ground?$k$p$WmMPID_レーヴァテイン,ch00_09_Laevatain_F_Normal,Face|No idea...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|No, we don't have any idea. Yet.
Whatever it might be...$k$pIf we can find it first, we can cut off
their path to victory. And if we can do
that, we win.$k$p$Sbs150|
